title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 1, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 1, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary reconnect to give an update on the breaking news surrounding Bill Cosby, an update in the Britney Spears case and Mark talks about a new client who had a very scary experience with his new car.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
